name: iauro
tag_list: iphone, ipad, ios, android, mobile-app-development, cloud, aws, hadoop, map-reduce
overview:
iauro Technologies LLP started in early 2009. We have grown from 3 people to a team ofIauro has extensive experience in following domains –

• Mobile –

  • iauro has been working on iOS and Android right from the launch of iOS/Android SDKs.
  • iauro has delivered more than 200+ applications to startups, mid-size companies to fortune 500 companies.
  • iauro’s strength lies in taking single line concept and delivering a final working finished product.

• Cloud –

  • iauro has helped multiple startups to kickoff using cloud-based solutions.
  • Also has helped companies to move their existing infrastructure to cloud provider.

• BigData –

  • iauro has experience on BigData analytics and Hadoop eco-system.
  • We have created solutions to crawl millions of record from social sites (e.g Twitter) and media/movies related sites (YouTube and IMDB).
